DOC.brief_summary: Study investigate safety profile AZD4721 single dos different dose level
DOC.brief_title: Study Investigate Safety Profile AZD4721 After Single Doses Different Dose Levels
DOC.detailed_description: A study investigate safety tolerability single ascending dos AZD4721 give healthy volunteer . Including bioequivalence part compare solution AZD4721 suspension .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Healthy male and/or female Caucasian ( neither Black/African American Japanese ) volunteer age 1850 year . ( `` Healthy '' determine medical history physical examination , clinical laboratory parameter , ECG ) 2 . Females must negative pregnancy test screen admission unit , must lactate must nonchildbearing potential 3 . Volunteers BMI 18 30 kg/m2 ( inclusive ) weigh least 50 kg 100 kg ( inclusive ) . 1 . History clinically important disease disorder , opinion Investigator , may either put volunteer risk participation study , influence result volunteer 's ability participate 2 . Current smoker smoke used nicotine product within previous 3 month 2.Clinically significant low respiratory tract infection resolve within 4 week prior Visit 1 , determine Investigator 4 . Other latent chronic infection ( eg , recurrent sinusitis , genital ocular herpes , urinary tract infection ) risk infection ( surgery , trauma , significant infection ) previous 90 day , history skin abscess within previous
